item.description:
Bring one of your own new or old project you would like to start or finish.  I finished a tree top I started many years ago. Abelille also has kits you can purchase starting about $10.00 & up (also discounts for tools, & supplies purchased) . Lets think  Christmas in July or maybe something you want to work on outside of home.

Will bring  snack & beverage to share .

Have a group project idea let us know !
item.how_to_find_us: Will be at table working on project we want to start or finish.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Free Monthly DIY Craft Meetup to Start or Finish your project
